mapper.sql: AUTH_ID, APPLY_ID, APPLY_TYPE, USER_ID, USERNAME, AUTH_USER_ID, AUTH_USERNAME, AUTH_STATUS, AUTH_REMARK, AUTH_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from oa_auth_jnl
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into oa_auth_jnl
AUTH_ID,
APPLY_ID,
APPLY_TYPE,
USER_ID,
USERNAME,
AUTH_USER_ID,
AUTH_USERNAME,
AUTH_STATUS,
AUTH_REMARK,
AUTH_DATE,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,

#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update oa_auth_jnl
AUTH_ID = #{record.authId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPLY_ID = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
APPLY_TYPE = #{record.applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

AUTH_USER_ID = #{record.authUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUTH_USERNAME = #{record.authUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_STATUS = #{record.authStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUTH_REMARK = #{record.authRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_DATE = #{record.authDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update oa_auth_jnl set AUTH_ID = #{record.authId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPLY_ID = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, APPLY_TYPE = #{record.applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_USER_ID = #{record.authUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUTH_USERNAME = #{record.authUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_STATUS = #{record.authStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUTH_REMARK = #{record.authRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_DATE = #{record.authDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

APPLY_TYPE = #{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
